resources.string: Card Track requires permission to read your SMS to track your card spending by reading the notifications sent by your bank

Always verify your dues with your credit card statement. Card Track makes no guarantee of correctness of the data shown. Card Track relies on SMS notification to identify transactions. However, SMS messages are unreliable and notifications may not be delivered. Your card issuer may not send an SMS notification for all transactions (such as EMI debits) or charge hidden fees (like forex markup). Also, Card Track may not be able to recognize all transaction notifications sent by your card issuer. Treat the amounts shown by Card Track as a convenience rather than a source of truth.
